revised_title: On the Construction of the Imperial Standard Pound and Its Copies of Platinum, and the Comparison of the Imperial Standard Pound with the Kilogramme des Archives
tldr: This article discusses the construction of the Imperial Standard Pound and its copies of platinum, as well as the comparison of the Imperial Standard Pound with the Kilogramme des Archives. It also explores the use of quartz weights and their density measurements in determining the accuracy of these standards.
